name: Deep Survivors Guilts
description:
This game came to my wife and me as a challenge to test ourselves and expand our boundaries a bit. We wanted to find new aspects of gaming and some new art concepts we have been thinking about lately. We had some spare time so we decided to compete and be part of the Ludum Dare 48. We assisted before on Ludum Dare 46, but then we were much less experienced.

The game itself is a combination of gravity physics we calculated and rigged ourselves with some nice assets me and my friends made in some hourse.
